subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte was backed by three home runs, from newcomers Travis Hafner, Vernon Wells and Lyle Overbay, as the Yankees posted a 9-4 win in Toronto.
snippet: Andy Pettitte was backed by three home runs, from newcomers Travis Hafner, Vernon Wells and Lyle Overbay, as the Yankees posted a 9-4 win in Toronto.
